mn140:2.1: viharemu āvesane → viharāma āvesane (bj); viharāma nivesane (sya-all, km); viharāmāvesane (pts1ed); viharemu nivesane (mr)
mn140:6.2: mamañca khvāyaṁ → mamaṁ khvāyaṁ (bj, sya-all, km); maṁ khvāyaṁ (pts1ed)
mn140:8.3: Chayimā, bhikkhu, dhātuyo → etthantare pāṭho si, pts1ed potthakesu
mn140:19.2: Tena ca viññāṇena kiṁ → tena viññāṇena kiñci (sya-all, pts1ed)
mn140:20.2: ninnītakasāvaṁ → nihaṭakasāvaṁ (bj); nihatakasāvaṁ (mr) | sudhantaṁ niddhantaṁ → etthantare pāṭho sya-all potthakesu | jātarūpaṁ → jātarūpaṁ dhantaṁ (bj, pts1ed) | nīhaṭaṁ → nihataṁ (si, sya-all, km, mr) | paṭṭikāya → pavaddhikāya (bj); pavaṭṭikāya (sya-all, pts1ed)
mn140:35.2: vibbhantā gāvī → bhantagāvī (si, pts1ed), vibhantagāvī (si), gāvī (sya-all, km)
mn140:36.4: vihesesi → viheṭhesi (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed); viheseti (mr)
